title.rendered: The Tax Deadline: filing extensions (for free!) and more

content.rendered: affordable CEO David King and Lead Tax Attorney Philip Hwang answer questions about the tax deadline. How to file a tax extension for free, which form to use when filing an extension, how to avoid costly penalties and interest, and how affordable can help.

excerpt.rendered: affordable CEO David King and Lead Tax Attorney Philip Hwang answer questions about the tax deadline. How to file a tax extension for free, which form to use when filing an extension, how to avoid costly penalties and interest, and how affordable can help.
